description:
If a user creates a port, attaches the interface to a VM, and then detaches the interface from the VM, he/she then finds that the port is deleted. The same happens when the VM is destroyed.

It would be desirable to keep the port when the interface is detached/VM destroyed, if the port is created independently.
title: Nova deletes user-created ports

comments.content:
I created a port, attached the interface to a VM, and then detached the interface from the VM.

I found that the port was deleted. I think the port should not be deleted when the interface is detached, if the port is created independently. The port is also deleted when the VM is destroyed.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~armando-migliaccio

comments.content: This got addressed but not in the context of this bug report.
